titles.title: Urban Mass Transportation Fair Share Act of 1993
A bill to provide for the utilization of the latest available census data in certain laws related to urban mass transportation.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1198-1199)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Urban Mass Transportation Fair Share Act of 1993 - Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to base the apportionment of Federal transportation funds for certain urban and nonurban mass transportation programs on census estimates prepared by the Department of Commerce. (Currently, the apportionment is based only on the latest available Federal census.)
